testcase.classname: F1_Register | users could register with new accounts
testcase.name: guest user could register with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user go to register page..............................................passed When user select gender type................................................passed And user enter first name "automation" and last name "tester"...............passed And user enter date of birth................................................passed And user enter email field..................................................passed And user fills Password fields "P@ssw0rd" "P@ssw0rd"........................passed And user clicks on register button..........................................passed Then success message is displayed...........................................passed

testcase.name: SC2- User could log in with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to log in page................................................passed When user login with valid "mauricio.senger@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd".....passed Then user log in successfully...............................................passed

testcase.name: SC2- User could log in with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to log in page................................................passed When user login with invalid "wrong@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd".............passed Then user cannot log in.....................................................passed

testcase.classname: F03_currencies | users could deal with different currencies

testcase.system-out: When user select euro from currencies list..................................passed Then Verify the Euro Symbol (€) is displayed on the 4 products in Home page.passed
